none:
Originally ripped by Terminal Escape, posted on May 20, 2020 Description from Terminal Escape:
Four songs. Three minutes. Destructive US hardcore ferocity that nods generously to the early '90s...a time when, in retrospect, when things weren't nearly as dangerous, but the music was.  PENETRATE

seo.title: Penetrate - Penetrate demo 2012 - Terminal Escape
